description: Crafting front-end architectures for large scale web applications using ES6, Angular, React, Redux, WebPack, NodeJS, Git, etc. When needed, I play the role of agile coach, scrum master and technical lead of the development team.
Building the new front-end web architecture from scratch using the last cutting-edge technologies and techniques such as ES6, React, WebPack, NodeJS, Isomorphic/Universal JavaScript and Flux.
Enhancing performance and architecture of the brand new multi-device banking platform for ING Direct Spain. HTML5, CSS3 (Stylus, RWD), JavaScript (Backbone, Marionette, RequireJS, NodeJS, Grunt).
Web apps development with HTML5, CSS3 (Compass, Responsive Web Design), JavaScript (AngularJS, NodeJS, Yeoman, Grunt), Git and more.
Boosting User Interface to the next level with HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript (Backbone, Marionette, RequireJS, jQuery, NodeJS)
Developing cross-platform web applications with HTML5. The JavaScript stack includes Backbone, Marionette, jQuery, jQuery Mobile, underscore, RequireJS, PhoneGap, etc.
Working on the new website of BBVA bank (launched on April, 2013). Writing HTML5, CSS3 (SASS), modular JavaScript APIs (Backbone, underscore, jQuery & more).
Building the product from scratch using SCRUM, TDD, LAMP, JavaScript (jQuery), XHTML, CSS, Git. Integrations with affiliates, Google and Facebook APIs.
Websites for clients such as Orange, Endesa, MRW, McDonalds, Wilkinson, Alfa Romeo, Lancia, Real Madrid FC, entradas.com, Mutua Madrileña, la Caixa, red.es, AECEM, etc. LAMP, XHTML, CSS, JavaScript.
Software programming, R&D projects, web apps, with Open Source technology: PHP (Joomla), HTML, CSS, JavaScript (jQuery).
